title: Print, ca. 1788
inscribed:
Imprinted from lower left to lower left center: Casque Antique du choix de Raphael et souvent employe dans ses ouvrages//Aubert P. fecit.

Imprinted lower center: Vase de Composition pose sure un Autel Antique quie voit a Rome a la Ville Medicis
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: At center is a large vase on a pedestal flanked by a helmet on the left and a medallion and three legged bowl on the right

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, ca. 1788.
ca. 1788. Sheet: 44.3 x 29.4 cm (17 7/16 x 11 9/16 in.). Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-228-5.
